data.text: @ecehankoc in the U.K., airlines are ditching masks https://t.co/CuNXUsyKj9
@ecehankoc Sospettavo la zona ma non conoscevo di preciso. Sembra molto figo.
@fgavazzoni Si certo, esattamente qua. È veramente “Heaven on Earth”. https://t.co/FouTWv07Sc

@wiseman31663184 They said where there is no ventilation or where social distancing can’t be maintained, it is recommended to put a mask on. But tbh, even last year no one was really wearing a mask, even indoors. At least in Adana and Fethiye, where I have been to. Bigger cities, I don’t know.
